venue.address_2: beside Lenox Hotel in Back Bay
venue.name: Solas Irish Pub

item.description: Come for the food or come for the drink.  Either way, hey, just come and have a great time.  We'll be at the bar.  If enough of us want to eat, we'll get a table.  Call me if you have any questions: (215) 783-2208 - Ed.
item.why: This looks like a great place to let it all hang out... And they've got Guinness. Okay, that's not exactly a compelling reason to go, but hey, it's as good as any. How about taking a chance and go BAY SIDE? Step out and have fun on this Thursday!
item.name: Solas - An IRISH PUB!
